channel.title: Webclient Error [After Jarring & Signing]
channel.description: Allright so i made all the things to make the webclient, It downloads and runs the cache and all that 100%. Ive noticed the client runs from a jar named "Theme.Jar". So when i Jar the client and all it Jars and Signs 100% fine. When I run the Jar it loads a lil but then gives me that black error page with yellow text. My Manifest is "Client" btw.

item.title: Webclient Error [After Jarring & Signing]
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I don’t understand properly. Can you explain what you mean? My auto cache downloader etc works fine… Everything works fine (after quite a bit of work) but I can’t seem to jar it. I think I have to jar it different from the way I’m used to (in all tutorials).
Its hard to explain what I mean, if you have MSN and are willing to help me we can talk there fringie@cookie-pkz.com . That is my ONLY thing I need help with, I do tutorials for my server nothing else, so I wont bug you if you are assuming I will.
Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Error [After Jarring & Signing]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Not that path, you set a path wrong that lead’s to the cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Error [After Jarring & Signing]
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

ExtremeX, what would the path be in the in the manifest can you please give an example.

Look at the Orical-x v2 or TorvaPkz webclient ready. I think its cause the client.class file is in the ‘bin’ folder but i’m not sure what I would do with the jar maker (the one fro ric’s webclient tut).
Me and Sam have the same issue and I really don’t wanna use that piece of hybrid pvp v3 webclient…
Many thanks if you reply with help.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

you didn’t set all your path’s.

item.description:

Allright so i made all the things to make the webclient, It downloads and runs the cache and all that 100%. Ive noticed the client runs from a jar named “Theme.Jar”. So when i Jar the client and all it Jars and Signs 100% fine. When I run the Jar it loads a lil but then gives me that black error page with yellow text.
